  • Method Details

    • getUserRole

      public String getUserRole(String username)
      Gets the role as a string. Throws an exception if the role string is not found in the user object.
      Parameters:
      username - username to check
      Returns:
      role as a lower-case string

    • createNewUser

      public boolean createNewUser(String username, String passwordString, String role)

    • updateUserPassword

      public boolean updateUserPassword(String username, String newPassword)
      Changes the password of the selected user. The underlying CSV file is then saved.
      Parameters:
      username - username, aka id
      newPassword - new password string
      Returns:
      True if password is successfully changed, false if password doesn't meet requirements.

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(String username)
      Deletes the user with the given username. Only used in testing for now
      Parameters:
      username - username (id) of the user.

    • getUserObject

      public User getUserObject(String username)
      Retrieves the user object with a given username. Throws a runtime exception if the username does not exist
      Parameters:
      username - username string
      Returns:
      A User object
